HomePage.title: Telos: Intelligent Process Orchestration Platform
HomePage.subtitle: Modern and scalable intelligent workflow orchestration platform
HomePage.description: Supports automated task scheduling and management, adopts front-end separation and micro-service architecture, suitable for enterprise-level automation scenarios

features.title: core features
features.frontend: The front-end is based on Next.js15 + Shadcn UI for a smooth experience
features.backend: Back-end Go microservices, excellent performance and easy to expand
features.communication: Support tRPC/gRPC, type safe, efficient communication between services
features.monorepo: Monorepo management, unified dependence, easy collaboration

frontend.title: Front-end technology stack
frontend.nextjs: Next.js15-Utilize App Router for server components and routing optimization
frontend.shadcn: Shadcn UI -A component library based on Tailwind CSS to quickly build responsive interfaces
frontend.typescript: TypeScript -Strongly typed language improves code stability and maintainability
frontend.trpc: tRPC -Implement type-safe API calls between front and back ends
frontend.zustand: Zustand -Lightweight state management library that handles complex interaction logic

backend.title: Back-end technology stack
backend.go: Go-high-performance, natively supports concurrency, suitable for microservices architecture
backend.gin: Gin/Echo -Lightweight HTTP framework for quickly building API interfaces
backend.grpc: gRPC -A high-performance RPC framework based on Protobuf for inter-service communication
backend.postgresql: PostgreSQL -relational database that stores structured data
backend.redis: Redis -Cache database to speed up data reading and task queuing processing

infrastructure.title: infrastructure
infrastructure.docker: Docker -containerized deployment to ensure environmental consistency
infrastructure.kubernetes: Kubernetes -Cluster orchestration for automated deployment and capacity expansion
infrastructure.helm: Helm - K8s package manager simplifies the application deployment process
infrastructure.tracing: Jaeger -Distributed tracking to locate service call chain problems

gsap.animation: Cool entrance animation powered by GSAP!
